meanings.definition: To haggle or bargain over the price of something.
meanings.sent1: She niffered with the vendor over the cost of the necklace.
meanings.sent2: The customers niffered with the salesperson to get a better deal on the furniture.
meanings.sent3: The siblings niffered playfully over who would get the last cookie.
meanings.sent4: The two friends niffered like skilled negotiators, trying to reach a fair agreement.
meanings.sent5: The market was filled with the sound of people niffering over various items.

meanings.definition: To exchange goods or services in a casual or informal manner.
meanings.sent1: They niffered their homemade jams for fresh vegetables from the neighbors.
meanings.sent2: The children niffered their toys during playtime.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends niffered snacks during their picnic in the park.
meanings.sent4: The villagers niffered goods at the weekly market, creating a lively atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The classmates niffered books to read over the weekend.
